title: All-Star Reserves, Lakers Lose Three Straight, and Porzingis Trade Rumors | Group Chat
description:
Justin, Tjarks, and Rob are joined by The Ringer’s Dan Devine to discuss whether the Lakers are in trouble after losing three straight (01:30), as well as Kristaps Porzingis trade rumors (08:00). Later, they discuss their picks for All-Star reserves (17:30).
Hosts: Justin Verrier, Jonathan Tjarks, and Rob Mahoney
Guest: Dan Devine
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
